meanings: a great warship, a big ship[vessel].
(마주하다, 마주 보다) face, look at, see

vlive.korean: 저는 '가끔 4살 차이 나는 언니를 막 대함' - 뭐라고 적었는지 기억도 안 난다. "She acts rough towards me, who is four years older than her." - I don't remember what I wrote. 듣기 View video LOVELYZ : LOVELYZ 3rd ANNIVERSARY
vlive.english: "She acts rough towards me, who is four years older than her." - I don't remember what I wrote.

vlive.korean: 포즈에 대해서 고민 같은 거 좀 하지 않았어요? Did you think about the pose? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 답을 줘가 벌써 막방일 리가 없썽.. 시간 돌려줭..😭😭 (AB6IX’s V after last performance for ‘THE ANSWER’)

vlive.korean: 그때 포즈에 대해서 고민같은 거 하지 않았어요? Didn't you think about the poses? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 막방😭😭

examples.korean: In a way, Chinese people are making Japanese apologize by doing this. 발음듣기 어떻게 보면 중국 사람들은 일본인들을 이렇게 대함으로써 사과하게 만든다. Neungyule
examples.english: In a way, Chinese people are making Japanese apologize by doing this. 발음

examples.korean: If you want to be friends with someone, you can let that person know by being friendly. 발음듣기 만약 여러분이 누군가와 친구가 되고 싶다면, 여러분은 친근하게 대함으로써 그들이 알게 할 수 있어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: If you want to be friends with someone, you can let that person know by being friendly. 발음

examples.korean: Shortly after the report, North Korea fired three anti-ship cruise missiles into the sea off its east coast. 발음듣기 발표 후 곧이어 북한은 동해안으로부터 바다를 향해 세발의 대함 크루즈미사일을 발사했다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Shortly after the report, North Korea fired three anti-ship cruise missiles into the sea off its east coast. 발음

examples.korean: This story was heard around the world and did a lot to change the way that celebrity stalkers were treated by the police. 발음듣기 이 이야기는 전세계로 퍼졌고 경찰이 유명 인사를 따라다니는 스토커 팬들을 대함에 있어 많은 변화를 주도록 만들었습니다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: This story was heard around the world and did a lot to change the way that celebrity stalkers were treated by the police. 발음

examples.korean: Also, kids and parents show their love by respecting each other, being polite and thoughtful. 발음듣기 또한, 어린이들과 부모님들은 서로를 존중하고, 예의를 갖추고 사려 깊게 대함으로써 그들의 사랑을 표현할 수 있어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Also, kids and parents show their love by respecting each other, being polite and thoughtful. 발음
